# Preamble

This book is created and maintained as part of the R-group on neuroscience research at the Neurovascular Research Group at Aarhus University Hospital.

The book is build using the **bookdown** package[R-bookdown] using the [**bookdown-demo**](https://github.com/rstudio/bookdown-demo).


```{r include=FALSE}
# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown', 'REDCapR', 'tidyverse'
), 'packages.bib')
```
